content.rendered:
Each year the Saratoga Springs High School Hall of Distinction honors outstanding individuals for their extraordinary professional and community accomplishments.

Hall of Distinction Recipients 

  • 2014: Madelyn Pulver Jennings (Class of 1952) and William (Bill) P. Dake (Class of 1953)
  • 2015: David Hyde Pierce (Class of 1977) and Pia Carusone (Class of 1999)
  • 2016: James A. Murphy, III (Class of 1979) and Dottie Pepper (Class of 1983)
  • 2017: David R. Carr, Sr. (Class of 1949) and Laura Yates LeCours, M.D. (Class of 1977)
  • 2018: Susan Pasmik Allerdice (Class of 1964) and Charles V. Wait (Class of 1969)
  • 2019: Christine Alexander-Decker, MD, FACE (Class of 1990) and Charles Kuenzel (Class of 1970)
  • 2021: Wallace Allerdice (Class of 1960), Meg Kelly (Class of 1977), and Bill Grande (Class of 1951)
  • 2022:  Jennifer Jolly (Class of 1989) and Matt Jones (Class of 1972).
  • 2023: Joseph Bruchac (Class of 1960), Kari Philo Cushing (Class of 1994), and Margaret Stoddard Perkins (Class of 1936). 
  • 2024: Harvey R Fox (Class of 1971) and Heidi Owen West (Class of 1974)
  • 2025: Sonny Bonacio (Class of 1985) and Dr. Jenny Lounsbury (Class of 2001.
